prompts: Create a deer-like Pokemon with majestic antlers and a gentle expression.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the forest with earthy tones.
Generate a creature resembling a stag with a calm demeanor and soft fur.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands with unique antler designs.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into its forest surroundings effortlessly.
Design a Normal-type Pokemon with a focus on agility and stealth.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a woodland creature with enchanting features.
